meanings.definition: Least attractive or pleasing in appearance
meanings.sent1: The old, torn couch was the unloveliest piece of furniture in the room.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house on the corner was the unloveliest building on the street.
meanings.sent3: Despite its unloveliest appearance, the stray puppy had the kindest eyes.
meanings.sent4: The unloveliest flower in the garden still held a delicate beauty.
meanings.sent5: Her unloveliest dress became a fashion statement with the right accessories.

meanings.sent1: The unloveliest painting in the gallery failed to capture anyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The unloveliest part of the park was the neglected fountain in the corner.
meanings.sent3: Despite its unloveliest appearance, the old car had a reliable engine.
meanings.sent4: The unloveliest song on the album still had a haunting melody.
meanings.sent5: Even the unloveliest sunset painted the sky with vibrant colors.
